headline: 4 Are Dead as Man Plows Car Through German City Center
text: BERLIN — Four people were killed and 10 others wounded after a drunk man sped in his S.U.V. through a pedestrian shopping street in the city of Trier in southwestern Germany on Tuesday. Prosecutors said the man did not appear to be motivated by political or religious beliefs and that they were investigating the case on suspicion of murder.
snippet: The police in the southwestern city of Trier arrested a German man who sped through a pedestrian shopping area, killing four people. Prosecutors say there is no indication of a political or religious motive.
